# metalTexture

**Instance Property**

A MTLTexture object that can be bound for input using Metal.

## Declaration

```swift
var metalTexture: (any MTLTexture)? { get }
```

## Discussion



## Accessing Input Image Data

- **baseAddress**: The base address of CPU memory that your Core Image Processor Kernel can read pixels from.
- **pixelBuffer**: An input pixel buffer object that your Core Image Processor Kernel can read from.
- **surface**: An input surface object that your Core Image Processor Kernel can read from.
